project_name.justification: The text identifies the project of interest directly: 'The first being the Dauntless gold property, which includes the historic Weepah gold mine, located in Esmeralda County, Nevada...'

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first sentence: 'Fortitude Gold (OTCQB:FTCO) (the "Company") today announced it has acquired 100% interest in two separate gold properties within Nevada's Walker Lane Mineral Belt. The first being the Dauntless gold property...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the acquiring company, Fortitude Gold, is named in the text: '...stated Mr. Jason Reid, CEO and President of Fortitude Gold.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The company acquired a 100% interest in the Dauntless project. 'Fortitude Gold (OTCQB:FTCO) (the "Company") today announced it has acquired 100% interest in two separate gold properties... The first being the Dauntless gold property...'

primary_commodity.justification: The text describes the project as a gold property: 'Fortitude Gold Acquires Two Additional High-Grade Nevada, USA Gold Properties' and '...acquired 100% interest in two separate gold properties... The first being the Dauntless gold property...'

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the acquisition of the Dauntless project by Fortitude Gold Corp. The link is provided at the bottom of the text: 'View the original press release on accesswire.com'

currency.justification: The currency for the transaction is specified as US dollars: 'The Company purchased 100% interest in the Dauntless claim package for total consideration of US$725,000.'

cash_payments_raw.justification: A cash payment was made for the Dauntless project: 'The Company purchased 100% interest in the Dauntless claim package for total consideration of US$725,000.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The text specifies a cash consideration for the Dauntless project and does not mention any share payments for this specific acquisition.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: A specific cash payment amount was identified, so this field is not applicable according to the extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction terms for the Dauntless project were for cash consideration, with no mention of shares being issued.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction terms for the Dauntless project.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction terms for the Dauntless project.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the Dauntless project acquisition, so there is no issued share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The announcement does not specify any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The announcement does not specify any monetary exploration commitment for the Dauntless project.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: As part of the transaction, the seller retained a net smelter return royalty: 'Nevada Select Royalty Inc retained a maximum net smelter return royalty (NSR) of 3% on future production from the property claims.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The total area for the Dauntless project, including newly staked claims, is listed in the acquisition highlights: '4,680 acres total acquired and staked high-grade gold exploration property'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified in the acquisition highlights: '4,680 acres total acquired and staked high-grade gold exploration property'.

resource_size.justification: The text mentions historical production ('60,000 ounces of gold mined') and third-party drill intercepts, but does not provide a current, quantified mineral resource estimate for the project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph of the press release: 'Fortitude Gold (OTCQB:FTCO) (the "Company") today announced it has acquired 100% interest...'
